title: Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value as 'aaa' in the list box.
3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
4. Change the Display type to Combo Box.
5. Click OK to save the changes.

OB: None
EB: The default value should be 'aaa'. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.

SR: 1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value as 'aaa' in the list box.
3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
4. Change the Display type to Combo Box.
5. Verify that the default value is 'aaa'.
6. Verify that the OK button is grayed out.
